abstract: Consortium Uniting to Combat NTDs issues report arguing that every dollar invested in fighting neglected tropical diseases would generate up to $200 in productivity gains by 2030.
lead_paragraph: A consortium argued that every $1 invested in fighting neglected tropical diseases would generate $50 to almost $200 in productivity gains by 2030.

headline.main: Fight Against Tropical Diseases Is Framed as Efficient
headline.print_headline: Efficiencies of Fighting Certain Tropical Diseases

snippet: A consortium argued that every $1 invested in fighting neglected tropical diseases would generate $50 to almost $200 in productivity gains by 2030.
